channel.title: Teleblock help
channel.description:
Hi, thank you for reviewing my post.
1.I need help in making the teleblock.When i teleblock someone in my 317 server, they can always use commands to get away. How do i code it so that you cant use commands to escape when you are teleblocked?
2.Also how would i make a command that makes a person get teleblocked like.... ::teleblock (playername)
3. How would i make a command that teles a person somewhere for example: I set a command to tele the other person to lumby. i would do ::lumby (playername)
thank you for answering all my questions i really am greatful for all the people in morparscape.
Thanks again!

item.title: Teleblock help
item.dc:creator: @ProjectSix ProjectSix
item.description:
@ProjectSix wrote:


Use to ::lumby basics of ::teletome

Read full topic
